< h3 > Otras contribuciones < /h3>

Delici游볮us es un proyecto de c칩digo abierto y nos encanta recibir contribuciones de nuestra comunidad: 춰t칰! Hay otras formas de contribuir, adem치s de enviar recetas, como enviar informes de errores y solicitudes de caracter칤sticas o escribir c칩digo que se puede incorporar en Delici游볮us..

< p > Para algo que es m치s grande que una correcci칩n de una o dos l칤neas: < /p>

  5. Mover archivos de origen de un directorio o paquete a otro
    6. < /ul> < h3 > C칩mo reportar un error < /h3>

    If you find a security vulnerability, do NOT open an issue. Email me ramonmorcillodev@gmail.com instead.

    < h3 > How to suggest a feature or enhancement < /h3>

    The Delici游볮us philosophy is to be a site where, at first, developers can add and see their recipes. If you find yourself wishing for a feature that doesn't exist in Delici游볮us, you are probably not alone. There are bound to be others outthere with similar needs. Many of the features that Elasticsearch has today have been added because our users saw the need. Open an issue on our issues list on GitHub which describes the feature you would like to see, why you need it,and how it should work.
